name: Haywire (itch) (Firebelley)
description:
Harness the power of a weapon coursing with unstable energy. Blast your way through energy anomalies without being fried yourself!

Controls are explained in-game.

Credits
  • Art & Design: Aditon
  • Programming & Design: Firebelley
  • Made using the Godot Engine.
  • Sounds were created using a library of commercial-use sound effects. As such, we've opted out of the audio rating.
  • Music by Alex McCulloch from OpenGameArt.

Submitted for Ludum Dare 49.
